pages.text: If you got a [#](bb00bb)Dirt Block[#]() whenever you mined an ore and it fell right into [#](bb00bb)Lava[#](), you'd have a whole lot of [#](bb00bb)Dirt[#]().\No idea what you would do with that much [#](bb00bb)Dirt[#](). Maybe give it to a friend who has just arrived here and needs shelter on his first night?\Anyway, the dropping stuff into [#](bb00bb)Lava[#]() thing has to stop. Oh yeah, Lava! Same with every [#](bb00bb)Ghast Tear[#]() dropping into it, too.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Puts broken blocks and mob drops directly into your inventory instead of dropping them onto the ground.\\Max Level: 1\Applicable to mining tools, shears, weapons, bows, crossbows, tridents and Spectrum's fishing rods.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Inventory Insertion by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
